course_title: Topics in Jewish Languages: Yiddish for Speakers of German
course_description: This course will explore specific themes in the development of Hebrew or other Jewish languages. Sample literature will be studied in the original language. Topics will vary.
sections: Class Nbr: 5824, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 5:30-6:20p, Instructor: M. Udel, Status: Open
